channel.title: Thunar on GM游戏网
channel.description: Recent content in Thunar on GM游戏网

item.title: Thunar sftp.desktop
item.description: [Desktop Entry] Type=Application Version=1.0 Encoding=UTF-8 Exec=cp %F /mnt/data/src/yyy/GameServer Name=Copy To Data Store ffmpeg -video_size 1920x1080 -framerate 30 -f x11grab -i :0.0+0,0 -f alsa -i hw:1,1,0 -f alsa -i hw:1,1,1 -filter_complex amerge output.mkv
